Education

UOC University (Universitat Oberta de Catalunya)

BSc Computer Science

2017 - 2020

Founded in 1994, UOC is an internationally recognised online university with a community of over 60,000 students. The mission of the Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (UOC) is to provide people with lifelong learning and education opportunities. The aim is to help individuals meet their learning needs and provide them with full access to knowledge, above and beyond the usual scheduling and location constraints.

During my time at UOC to upgrade my previous university studies to the new Computer Science study program, I was able to learnt most of my dev skills rounding out my professional skills. I thouroughly enjoyed my time as university and learnt a lot about a healthy work life balance.

My professional role is specially related with system administration and cloud solution design skills. I have developed teamwork and working to tight deadlines skills.

I found a balance between my professional role, study and personal life.
